title: Particle motion from acceleration function part - c

content.question: For what values of t , <math> <mrow> <mn> 0 </mn> <mo> ≤ </mo> <mi> t </mi> <mo> ≤ </mo> <mi> π </mi> </mrow> </math> , is the particle at rest?
